response.original_title: 心霊写真と心霊映像 ベストセレクション Vol.2
response.overview: Due to popular demand, the second volume is now being released! As in the previous work, 15 ghost photos and 25 episodes of ghost images will be released again in an overwhelming volume worthy of the name "The Complete World of Ghosts"! The horrifying ghost images far surpassing the previous work are a must-see for all ghost fans! The ghost photos are not only taken in Japan, but also in foreign lands, where the eerie images are vividly captured. Included are "Narutsu Ni Nai Kudanai," "To See the Morning Sun," and others.
response.title: Shinrei Shashin to Shinrei Eizō: Best Selection 2
